com.punchline.javalib.entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.punchline.javalib.entities.ComponentManager
      • com.punchline.javalib.entities.Entity

  • public final class Entity
extends ComponentManager
    A game entity that contains several Components which define its attributes.
    Author:
    Nathaniel + WIlliam
